title: Photochemistry and Photobiology
additional-note: This was initially a British publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. It is currently published for an American organization, but we do not know whether early issues show signs of US publication.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Felice Gollotti for copyright research on this title.
